entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 12:07 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: W 62 km/h gust 90 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain and ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or a few local snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
